entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 700 metres. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Snow level 700 metres. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
